scripts.build:css: for f in assets/css/*.css; do case "$f" in *.min.css) continue;; esac; npx cleancss -o "${f%.css}.min.css" "$f"; done && echo 'CSS minified.'
scripts.build:js: for f in assets/js/*.js; do case "$f" in *.min.js) continue;; esac; npx terser "$f" -o "${f%.js}.min.js" --compress --mangle; done && echo 'JS minified.'
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
